column5: Remodeled and furnished home in central Marble Falls close to everything! Prepared with everything you need to stay comfortably, cook meals, and relax. Huge fenced yard, back deck, and grill. There is plenty of space to accommodate more than 10 guests, depending on number of children/infants, sleeping arrangements, if anyone is willing to sleep on the couch or loveseat, or tent camping. Just let me know if you have any questions!
